general.gigTitle: design or redesign and develop custom website on any platform

sellerCard.oneLiner: Web Developer, Shopify, Webflow, Framer, WordPress, Wix Studio expert
sellerCard.description:
Hello, this is Md Mansur Alam, a certified web developer, Shopify, Webflow, Framer, WordPress, WooCommerce, Wix, Wix Studio, Squarespace, and other CMS platforms specialist with more than 8 years of experience.

I have built many websites on different platforms with user-friendly interfaces and responsiveness on all devices. I have worked on simple to complex but stunning website designs. All website solutions here. Don't look for further contact now for a free consultation.

I'll make sure your website is well-optimized for mobile, tablet & desktop devices so that you can make impact online.

description.content:
Design or redesign and develop a custom website on any platform with 1 Year Free Support


Hi there!

Are you looking for a professional web developer to build a modern responsive website design or redesign and develop custom websites on any platform?


My developed site will be 100% secure, professional, responsive user-friendly, and all devices responsive.


I am Md Mansur Alam, a certified Full Stack Web Developer, WordPress, Shopify, Editor X and Wix Expert.


In this Gig I am offering:

  • Theme Setup and Installation 
  • Theme and Plugin Customization
  • Website Design
  • Blog Site Design
  • 100 % Responsive Website
  • Premium Theme Customization
  • Social Media Integration
  • Lifetime Free SSL
  • Contact Form
  • Live Chat
  • E-Commerce Features.
  • Payment Method Integration.
  • SEO Plugin Setup
  • Newsletter Subscription.
  • Add Security
  • Back-End Admin Panel To Manage site.
  • Support & Maintenance.
  • Speed and Performance Optimization


Why should you hire me?

  • Unlimited Revisions.
  • 1 Year Free Support
  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.


My Expertise:

My Expertise: Shopify | Wordpress | Editor X | Wix | ECommerce | Woocommerce | Blog | Responsive | Mobile Friendly | Plugin Installation | Landing Page | User Interface |

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need your domain name, hosting details, your website pages name, images, logo and text of the website. If you have any inspirational design in your mind and images for a website that will be great.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have any content for my website what should I do now?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry about it. I will help you. please contact me through the inbox.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create or customize website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can create and customize the website and can create it from scratch, you just need to give me content and sample (if any) I will deliver you in less time

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you also redesign existing sites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, please share link to your site to get a fair quote.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I update the website easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can update website like changing text & images. you can easily add new elements. Your website will have User-friendly back-end admin panel To Manage site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you support me after the project complete?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will give you 1 Year Free Support Client satisfaction is my first priority.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I order from you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Because I believe that the buyer's satisfaction is more important than money.

reviews.comment: I’ve known Mansuralem for a few years now, and he will always be my go to guy. He is fast, responsive and the quality of his work is unmatched. Fair pricing. Good guy. Good business.

Very easy going
Easy to reach 
Patient on all design changes
Reviews without issues and also provides extra support after completion in case needed. 

Thank You Mansur. :)
Always a pleasure to work with and great communication and skills
Great! Thank you for the help and awesome work and website design
I have worked with Mansur Alan for over a year now. He is truly an expert. Delivers fast, communicates throughout the projects, and cares about his clients! I highly recommend him.
